name: Create3DTextLabel
notes: drawdistance seems to be a lot smaller when spectating.
warnings:
If text[] is empty, the server/clients next to the text might crash!
If the virtualworld is set as -1 the text will not appear.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
tips: Use color embedding for multiple colors in the text.
description: Creates a 3D Text Label at a specific location in the world
params_title: (text[], color, Float:X, Float:Y, Float:Z, Float:DrawDistance, virtualworld, testLOS)

params_body.name: color
params_body.description: The text Color, as an integer or hex in RGBA color format

params_body.name: DrawDistance
params_body.description: The distance from where you are able to see the 3D Text Label

params_body.name: VirtualWorld
params_body.description: The virtual world in which you are able to see the 3D Text

params_body.name: testLOS
params_body.description: 0/1 Test the line-of-sight so this text can't be seen through objects

return_values: The ID of the newly created 3D Text Label, or INVALID_3DTEXT_ID if the 3D Text Label limit (MAX_3DTEXT_GLOBAL) was reached.
related_fn:
Delete3DTextLabel: Delete a 3D text label.
 Attach3DTextLabelToPlayer: Attach a 3D text label to a player.

 CreatePlayer3DTextLabel: Create A 3D text label for one player.

 UpdatePlayer3DTextLabelText: Change the text of a player's 3D text label.
